TText.description: Component representing single line text editor

label.description: Style for component label

invalid.description: Style for invalid component state. Contains all listed above fields:

name.description:
Any component name that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.name" field.
In addition component name can be used in global styles registered by "registerStyles" function to
associate particular style with this component

data.description: Any data that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.data" field

label.description: Label caption. Default is undefined and label is hidden

icon.description: Icon name to show. Default is undefined and icon is hidden

timeout.description: Represents timeout for "onChange" event in milliseconds. Default is "700"

placeholder.description: Text to show when editor is empty

layout.description: Label position towards text editor. Can be one of:

format.description: Text format. If specified entered text is checked with "format.mask" value:

mask.description: Text mask. "N" represents any number and "A" - any symbol

empty.description: Empty char. If length of empty char is grate than 1 then only first character is used. Default is "_"

full.description:
If true then onChange event fires only if date is completely entered or completely cleared.
Default is "true"

regexp.description: Regular expression to validate entered text

empty.description: Value appeared in onChange event when editor is empty. Default is "null"

required.description:
Indicates if necessary to change component color when entered date is invalid or incomplete.
Default is "true"

readOnly.description: Prevents from changing component value from user input, Default is "false"

onValidate.description: On text validate event. Fires if text validation is needed. Must return "true" if text is valid or "false" in other cases

TMask.description:
Component representing single line text editor with masked input. All functionality of masked input
realized in "TText" component. "TMask" represented only for compatibility reasons with previous versions

label.description: Style for component label

invalid.description: Style for invalid component state. Contains all listed above fields:

name.description:
Any component name that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.name" field.
In addition component name can be used in global styles registered by "registerStyles" function to
associate particular style with this component

data.description: Any data that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.data" field

label.description: Label caption. Default is undefined and label is hidden

icon.description: Icon name to show. Default is undefined and icon is hidden

timeout.description: Represents timeout for "onChange" event in milliseconds. Default is "700"

placeholder.description: Text to show when editor is empty

layout.description: Label position towards text editor. Can be one of:

format.description: Text format. If specified entered text is checked with "format.mask" value:

mask.description: Text mask. "N" represents any number and "A" - any symbol

empty.description: Empty char. If length of empty char is grate than 1 then only first character is used. Default is "_"

full.description:
If true then onChange event fires only if date is completely entered or completely cleared.
Default is "true"

regexp.description: Regular expression to validate entered text

empty.description: Value appeared in onChange event when editor is empty. Default is "null"

required.description:
Indicates if necessary to change component color when entered date is invalid or incomplete.
Default is "true"

readOnly.description: Prevents from changing component value from user input, Default is "false"

onValidate.description: On text validate event. Fires if text validation is needed. Must return "true" if text is valid or "false" in other cases

TMail.description:
Component representing editor for email input. "TMail" is a special case of "TText" component designed
for mail input

label.description: Style for component label

invalid.description: Style for invalid component state. Contains all listed above fields:

name.description:
Any component name that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.name" field.
In addition component name can be used in global styles registered by "registerStyles" function to
associate particular style with this component

data.description: Any data that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.data" field

label.description: Label caption. Default is undefined and label is hidden

icon.description: Icon name to show. Default is undefined and icon is hidden

timeout.description: Represents timeout for "onChange" event in milliseconds. Default is "700"

placeholder.description: Text to show when editor is empty

layout.description: Label position towards text editor. Can be one of:

empty.description: Value appeared in onChange event when editor is empty. Default is "null"

required.description:
Indicates if necessary to change component color when entered date is invalid or incomplete.
Default is "true"

readOnly.description: Prevents from changing component value from user input, Default is "false"

label.description: Style for component label

invalid.description: Style for invalid component state. Contains all listed above fields:

name.description:
Any component name that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.name" field.
In addition component name can be used in global styles registered by "registerStyles" function to
associate particular style with this component

data.description: Any data that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.data" field

label.description: Label caption. Default is undefined and label is hidden

icon.description: Icon name to show. Default is undefined and icon is hidden

timeout.description: Represents timeout for "onChange" event in milliseconds. Default is "700"

placeholder.description: Text to show when editor is empty

wrap.description:
If "true" editor preserves end of line characters in text and allows to wrap text when Enter key is pressed.
Otherwise (by default) it ignores new line characters and entered text treated as single string

empty.description: Value appeared in onChange event when editor is empty. Default is "null"

readOnly.description: Prevents from changing component value from user input, Default is "false"

label.description: Style for component label

list.description: Style for dropdown list. Contains fields:

value.description: Component initial value. Contains "key" value of default list item

name.description:
Any component name that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.name" field.
In addition component name can be used in global styles registered by "registerStyles" function to
associate particular style with this component

data.description: Any data that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.data" field

label.description: Label caption. Default is undefined and label is hidden

placeholder.description: Text to show when editor is empty

layout.description: Label position towards text editor. Can be one of:

readOnly.description: Prevents from changing component value from user input

showIcon.description: If "true" drop up/down indicator is shown

listMode.description: Determines what part of "item" should be shown in dropdown list

showMode.description: Determines what part of "item" should be shown in editor

clickable.description: Determines what components reacts on "onClick" events

onValidate.description: On text validate event. Fires if text validation is needed. Must return "true" if text is valid or "false" in other cases

label.description: Style for component label

list.description: Style for dropdown list. Contains fields:

value.description: Component initial value. Contains "key" value of default list item

name.description:
Any component name that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.name" field.
In addition component name can be used in global styles registered by "registerStyles" function to
associate particular style with this component

data.description: Any data that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.data" field

label.description: Label caption. Default is undefined and label is hidden

timeout.description: Icon name to show. Default is undefined and icon is hidden

placeholder.description: Text to show when editor is empty

layout.description: Label position towards text editor. Can be one of:

readOnly.description: Prevents from changing component value from user input

showIcon.description: If "true" drop up/down indicator is shown

chars.description: Minimal number of characters entered in editor required for "onSearch" event to be called

listMode.description: Determines what part of "item" should be shown in dropdown list

showMode.description: Determines what part of "item" should be shown in editor

clickable.description: Determines what components reacts on "onClick" events

onValidate.description: On text validate event. Component calls "onValidate" event when text validation is needed. Must return "true" if text is valid or "false" in other cases

onSearch.description: On search event. Component calls "onSearch" event whenever component text is changed and count of characters entered more than value determined by "chars" property. User defined "onSearch" event must call "callback" function with array of items like "[{key: ..., value: ...}, ...]" as parameter

event.value.name: event.value
event.value.description: Component text. Component fills "event.value" with editor text when text is changed and calls "onSearch" event

event.key.name: event.key
event.key.description: Component fills "event.key" with current item key value and calls "onSearch" event when search by key is needed. For example when "value" component property is assigned

callback.name: callback
callback.description: Callback function. Call "callback" to return items list back to component in form of "[{key: ..., value: ...}, ...]" as function argument

wait.description:
Component wait state. When "true" component appears in grey color and doesn't respond
on "onClick" event

TDate.description: Date editor with masked input and date value validation

label.description: Style for component label

invalid.description: Style for invalid component state. Contains all listed above fields:

value.description: Component initial value. Can be one of:

name.description:
Any component name that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.name" field.
In addition component name can be used in global styles registered by "registerStyles" function to
associate particular style with this component

data.description: Any data that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.data" field

label.description: Label caption. Default is undefined and label is hidden

layout.description: Label position towards text editor. Can be one of:

icon.description: Icon name to show. Default is undefined and icon is hidden

timeout.description: Represents timeout for "onChange" event in milliseconds. Default is "700"

empty.description: Empty char. If length of empty char is grate than 1 then only first character is used. Default is "_"

full.description:
If true then onChange event fires only if date is completely entered or completely cleared.
Default is "true"

type.description: Date format appeared in onChange event. Default is "iso" ("YYYY-MM-DD")

empty.description: Value appeared in onChange event then date is not completely entered or invalid. Default is "null"

required.description:
Indicates if necessary to change component color when entered date is invalid or incomplete.
Default is "true"

readOnly.description: Prevents from changing component value from user input, Default is "false"

event.value.name: event.value
event.value.description: Component date value. Date value format is determined by "format.type" property.

TTime.description: Time editor with time value validation

label.description: Style for component label

invalid.description: Style for invalid component state. Contains all listed above fields:

value.description: Component initial value. Can be one of:

name.description:
Any component name that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.name" field.
In addition component name can be used in global styles registered by "registerStyles" function to
associate particular style with this component

data.description: Any data that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.data" field

label.description: Label caption. Default is undefined and label is hidden

layout.description: Label position towards text editor. Can be one of:

icon.description: Icon name to show. Default is undefined and icon is hidden

timeout.description: Represents timeout for "onChange" event in milliseconds. Default is "700"

empty.description: Empty char. If length of empty char is grate than 1 then only first character is used. Default is "_"

full.description:
If true then onChange event fires only if date is completely entered or completely cleared.
Default is "true"

type.description: Time format appeared in onChange event. Default is "iso" ("hh:mm:ss")

empty.description: Value appeared in onChange event then date is not completely entered or invalid. Default is "null"

required.description:
Indicates if necessary to change component color when entered time is invalid or incomplete.
Default is "true"

readOnly.description: Prevents from changing component value from user input, Default is "false"

event.value.name: event.value
event.value.description: Component date value. Time value format is determined by "format.type" property.

label.description: Style for component label

name.description:
Any component name that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.name" field.
In addition component name can be used in global styles registered by "registerStyles" function to
associate particular style with this component

data.description: Any data that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.data" field

label.description: Label caption. Default is undefined and label is hidden

event.value.name: event.value
event.value.description: component value. If component state is checked then "value" equals to "checked" property. Otherwise it equals to "unchecked" property

TGroup.description: Groups components in a single block

label.description: Style for component label

content.description:
Style for group content. By default content is a "flex box" so it is possible to use
"flex" styles without specifying "display: 'flex'" in "content" section

label.description: Label caption. Default is undefined and label is hidden

container.description:
Style for outer component container. If "container" does not contain "height" field (by default)
"TScroll" fills all remaining space up to the bottom of screen

scrollBars.description: Scroll bars to show. Can be one of:

overflow.description: Overflow attribute. Can be one of:

tools.description: Style for tool box appeared in right corner of component

icon.description: Style for all tool icons. In addition one can specify custom icon style by icon name

name.description:
Any component name that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.name" field.
In addition component name can be used in global styles registered by "registerStyles" function to
associate particular style with this component

data.description: Any data that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.data" field

icon.description: Name of the main menu icon appeared in the left corner of component

onClick.description: On click event. Fires when main menu button or tools icon are clicked

name.description:
Any component name that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.name" field.
In addition component name can be used in global styles registered by "registerStyles" function to
associate particular style with this component

data.description: Any data that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.data" field

style.description: Item custom style. In addition one can specify custom item style by use of item name in "style" property

show.description: Indicates weather to show or close menu

touchWidth.description: The minimum touch move length in pixels required for menu to show/hide

initWidth.description: Left side area width in which component listens touch events when menu is closed

onClick.description: On click event. Fires when main menu button or tools icon are clicked

name.description:
Any component name that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.name" field.
In addition component name can be used in global styles registered by "registerStyles" function to
associate particular style with this component

data.description: Any data that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.data" field

showSelected.description: If "true" then current row is shown using "current" style

showHead.description: Indicates whether to show grid head or not
